Title: Sedition case against Amnesty illegal: Moily
Content: The former Union Law Minister Veerappa Moily has termed the sedition case filed against Amnesty International India as illegal.In an interview to Karan Thapar for India Today channel’s ‘To the Point’
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: The former Union Law Minister Veerappa Moily has termed the sedition case filed against Amnesty International India as illegal.In an interview to Karan Thapar for India Today channel’s ‘To the Point’
